statements: DELETE FROM students WHERE student_id = 1 AND grade = 'A';
DELETE FROM students WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM courses WHERE course_name = 'Math') AND grade = 'B';
DELETE FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours < 3 AND course_id NOT IN (SELECT course_id FROM students);
DELETE FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3 OR student_id = 4;
DELETE FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 2 AND course_id = 3;
